levels.description: Mon3tr gains DEF <@ba.vup>+{attack@def:0%}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{attack@atk:0%}</> that gradually decays to +0% over the skill duration and deals <@ba.vup>True damage</>. If this skill ends without Mon3tr killing any enemies, Mon3tr loses <@ba.vup>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> Max HP. <@ba.rem>This skill is </><$ba.binding><@ba.rem>Tied</> to Mon3tr</>
